4596d8f9-f0b7-4aeb-aa92-851222dc1888.name: Only Close On Hover
4596d8f9-f0b7-4aeb-aa92-851222dc1888.description: Show tab's close button only on hover, even on the active tab.
4596d8f9-f0b7-4aeb-aa92-851222dc1888.author: p-sw

906c6915-5677-48ff-9bfc-096a02a72379.name: Floating Status Bar
906c6915-5677-48ff-9bfc-096a02a72379.description: Mod for Zen Browser that detaches the status bar from the bottom left corner of the browser window.
906c6915-5677-48ff-9bfc-096a02a72379.author: AmirhBeigi

7d577b21-4685-4db2-bb17-d39d08eec199.name: Bleeding Corners Fix
7d577b21-4685-4db2-bb17-d39d08eec199.description: Fixes the white outlines (or artifacts) on the rounded corners that can appear on some pages. May cause higher GPU usage on some devices.
7d577b21-4685-4db2-bb17-d39d08eec199.author: rsiebertdev

f7c71d9a-bce2-420f-ae44-a64bd92975ab.name: Better Unloaded Tabs
f7c71d9a-bce2-420f-ae44-a64bd92975ab.description: Makes unloaded tabs easier to notice by making them greyscale and transparent.
f7c71d9a-bce2-420f-ae44-a64bd92975ab.author: Felkazz
